overview:
Techblog is the Greek blog about all the latest technologies, providing the opportunity to friends of new technologies to discuss, comment, learn, engage with technology and also interact with the other members of this online community about Consumer Electronic products, IT and Telecommunication products and services.

Techblog was founded in the beginning of 2007, aiming at providing valuable information and soon became a reliable informative tool satisfying the needs of todayâ€™s consumers, executives and all kinds of businesses.
